## Game.respondToPrompt() method

Called by the host when a player has responded to a prompt for input.

**Signature:**

```typescript
respondToPrompt(playerIndex: number, promptIndex: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  playerIndex | number | Which player responded. |
|  promptIndex | number | Which prompt did they respond to. |

**Returns:**

void
